title: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided - Digital Deluxe Ed. v1.16 build 761.0
description:
Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, RPG, Stealth, First-person, Third-person, 3D, Cyberpunk
Companies: Eidos-Montreal / Square Enix
Languages: RUS/ENG
Original Size: 46 GB
Repack Size: from 21.7 GB [Selective Download]


Repack Features

    Based on Deus.Ex.Mankind.Divided.A.Criminal.Past-SKIDROW ISO release: sr-demdacp.iso (49,235,722,240 bytes)
    Deus.Ex.Mankind.Divided.A.Criminal.Past.CRACKFIX-SKIDROW (94 MB) applied
    100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (when installed with all languages only)
    NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
    Selective download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of unnecessary voicepacks, bonus content (mini-OST, artbook, novel, comic book) and optional movies (see section below)
    Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 46 to 21.7~32.1 GB, depending on selected components)
    Installation takes from 10 minutes (SSD + 32 GB RAM) up to one hour (HDD + 8 GB RAM) for any single language. Additional languages/optionals will make installation longer
    After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
    HDD space after installation: up to 77 GB
    Game language can be changed in game settings
    In case the game doesn’t work – install Steam. Don’t run it, just install
    If you have 8 GB of RAM or less and the installer crash for you, try setup-multi8-slow-and-safe.exe instead of setup-multi8.exe
    If you want the exact, bit-perfect copy of the SKIDROW iso – download all language packs and select “Install all languages” option in the installer. In that scenario all movies will be bit-perfect. When installing just a single language, only tracks for this particular language are injected in movie files


Selective Download

You can skip downloading of voicepacks, optional and bonus files you don’t need. Here is the list of optional/selective files:

    setup-fitgirl-optional-bonus-content.bin (bonus content, listed above)
    setup-fitgirl-optional-videos.bin (Story recap video, Breach mode intro, placeholders and Breach-only movies, unavailable in cracked version – I gave YouTube links below for big ones – like Recap)
    setup-fitgirl-selective-english.bin (Also must be installed by Polish users)
    setup-fitgirl-selective-russian.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download setup-fitgirl-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-04)
